Header.title: Mohammed Moufakkir
Header.paragraph: Full Stack Developer | Software Engineer | Problem Solver

About.paragraph: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in building modern web applications. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions. My experience spans across various technologies including React, Node.js, and cloud services.

Services.name: Web Development
Services.text: Building responsive and modern web applications using React, Node.js, and other cutting-edge technologies.

Services.name: Mobile Development
Services.text: Creating cross-platform mobile applications with React Native and Flutter for iOS and Android.

Services.name: Database Design
Services.text: Designing and implementing efficient database solutions using SQL and NoSQL technologies.

Services.name: Cloud Services
Services.text: Deploying and managing applications on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

Services.name: API Development
Services.text: Creating robust RESTful APIs and microservices for scalable applications.

Services.name: Security
Services.text: Implementing security best practices and ensuring data protection in applications.
